Not quite. My perspective is more nuanced. Consider how economic systems create pathways for people to improve their lives through hard work and creative problem-solving. Tell me more about your perspective.

Let me share an illustrative perspective. Consider how economic frameworks that encourage personal initiative have consistently lifted millions out of poverty. The key isn't just about money - it's about creating ecosystems where human creativity and personal ambition can flourish without excessive constraints.
